summary: REQ-40/41/42 appear implemented via new/filled landing components, updated LandingPage composition, and an Internet Identity “ADMINISTRATIVE ACCESS” panel that navigates to /admin. REQ-44 backend access control changes are present for public reads and admin-only mutations plus message submission/retrieval. REQ-43 is only partially evidenced: the UI references the required poster image, but the diff does not show the required static image files being added under frontend/public/assets/generated, nor clear evidence of the required grid-tile background being used.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add the masterplan’s required static images into frontend/public/assets/generated (tt1-assembly-hero-poster.dim_1920x1080.png and syncing-grid-tile.dim_512x512.png) and render them in the UI (poster visible and grid tile used as a background layer), referenced directly via /assets/generated/....
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows frontend components referencing the poster image path, but does not show the required image files being added to frontend/public/assets/generated, and does not provide evidence that the syncing grid tile pattern is used in any background layer.
evidence: No added/modified files shown under frontend/public/assets/generated in the diff summary

hallucinated_features.description: CircuitryPulseBackground loads an additional static image /assets/generated/tt1-circuitry-bg.dim_1920x1080.png that is not listed among the required masterplan images.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only requires tt1-assembly-hero-poster.dim_1920x1080.png and syncing-grid-tile.dim_512x512.png; the circuitry background asset is extra and may not exist under the constrained static assets directory.

hallucinated_features.description: ProductSection references an additional image /assets/generated/tt1-transmitter-render.dim_1400x900.png that was not requested in REQ-43.
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-43 specifies only two required images; this introduces another asset dependency not mentioned in the request.

hallucinated_features.description: Backend user profile management APIs (getCallerUserProfile/getUserProfile/saveCallerUserProfile) were added/expanded beyond the access-control confirmation requested.
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-44 is focused on public reads for status/contact, admin-only mutations for dashboard/config, and persistence/retrieval of Messaging Terminal submissions; user profile CRUD is not requested.
evidence: backend/main.mo (UserProfile type and profile query/shared methods shown in diff)
